contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 22, 1913 D Llanelly Contest (Class A)
Llanelly Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Llanelly Contest llanelly-contest-class-a
None
Nabucco
St. Peter's Hall, Llanelly Prizes - 1st £12 and shield, 2nd £6, 3rd £3. Organised by West Wales Brass Band Association. 4 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2013, 7:30 a.m. Oct. 1, 2018, 3:13 p.m.
1 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen T. J. Rees
2 Emlyn Collieries William Hughes
3 4th V.B. Welsh Regiment (Llanelly) W. H. Williams
4 Ammanford Silver Band D. H. Thomas
